website_summaries.verdict: A smart blend of noise and pheromones for a variety of behavioral issues.
pros: Noise-pheromone combination provides a two-dimensional solution
Effective and gentle with pleasant lavender and chamomile scent
cons: Noise may cause anxiety in nervous dogs
Small container doesn't hold much liquid

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought two cans of this because some of the reviews said there were only about 15 blasts of spray. Unfortunately, both of the cans I purchased, had only one (1) blast each! Not a peep or a squirt on the second, third, fourth, etc. try. Also, when you hold the canister, it feels like there is nothing in it, it is so light. Too bad. If it worked, I think it would be effective because that one blast was impressive......so disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Great for most dogs
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have bought it many times. It really stops your dog in their tracks redirects them to do something else. I use it for barking and chewing. I will note that this is NOT for all dogs. Two of my friends' dogs will cower and retreat, sometimes shaking for minutes after this is used. So definitely test it out and do not continue if this happens to your dog. This is not simply compressed air (as many of the competitors are) but contains lavender and chamomile, which is supposed to have a pheromone effect. Whether or not this is true, I don't know, but the product does work well and has a pleasant scent.
customer_reviews.author: HannahTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Any time my dog sees the can he immediately stops barking! I have a miniature schnauzer and he is a talker omg so this is a MUST have for us. i tried the bark color and i felt so bad that it seemed that it was hurting him so i looked for another option, and this works wonders for us! I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: allayna

customer_reviews.title: Effective and Affordable Training Tool
customer_reviews.text: This actually works! I recently adopted a somewhat skittish 9yr old Peekapoo that would go after my cat if there was food around or if she suddenly jumped on the couch/bed. I actually used the spray only 3 or 4 times. After that, I just held the can up and he immediately backed down. It's been a couple of months now since I've even had to do that; the behavior seems to have been completely eliminated. The smell of the spray is not horribly unpleasant, but can seem a bit strong if sprayed right near the face. Still, an effective and affordable tool for getting your pup in line when needed. Definitely worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Tresa Kroger

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted it to work...
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the success stories I had high hopes for this product. I have a 120 pound mastiff who is leash aggressive, which is a big problem due to his weight and strength. It has gotten to the point where I'm afraid to walk him on my own. So when I saw this product I was so excited and crossed my finger it would be a solution. However, sadly, it was not. The loud noise didn't even make him flinch and the pheromones seemed to have no effect. I tried it on several occasions and it did nothing to even distract his leash aggression. It also ran out very quickly after just a handful of sprays.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Lara

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Was told to use this by dog training class. I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND USING THIS TYPE OF PRODUCT. We have a german shepherd pup and all this stuff did is piss him off. Now anytime anyone sprays ANYTHING HE GOES CRAZY AND TRIES TO ATTACK THEM. we currently have him in a class to try and change the bad behavior caused by this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Willson

customer_reviews.title: This is good stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this stuff is great!! I bought 2 - one for the house and one for the car. One of my dogs used to whine and bark at other dogs, people, whatever and that made my other dog crazy! Car rides were miserable! I used this TWICE and no more problems!! A couple months later he started to whine and I just picked it up and showed it to him...no issues since! Do NOT spray it near their face!! I didn't but could see how people might. Just the noise and scent are enough. It actually smells a little like lilac so I didn't mind it at all!! Recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: J Jones

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: If I didn't see the results with my own eyes I wouldn't have believed it...IT WORKS! My 7 month old puppy is great but she still loves to chew on people. One spray and she immediately stopped. Two sprays and she stopped completely. That was yesterday. Today she started to do it again and all I did was get the can and she stopped dead in her tracks. I will keep at this but so far, I'm blown away.
customer_reviews.author: Molmag

customer_reviews.title: THIS STUFF REALLY WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I’ve shared this product with numerous, HAPPY dog owners. If you have a yappy pet, don’t shock them or spray their faces with water. Simply poof this into the air. The sound gets attention and the pheromone spray immediately calms the pet. To us it smells like flowers. Apparently it is not my dog’s favorite. I’ve only had to spray it about 3 times. All I have to ask is, “Do WE need the CAN?” My dog turns her head as if to say, “MY BAD!” Life saver as a behavioral tool!
customer_reviews.author: TN MT Mama

customer_reviews.title: I don't know
customer_reviews.text: Okay so this was great... at first. The scent is nowhere near lavender chamomile. It smells more like grape cough medicine but it worked so that's what matters. The sound is great stopped bad behavior and the smell only lasts a few minutes so it isn't too offensive. Just showing my pets the bottle was enough to get them to stop some things like jumping on the TV stand and scratching furniture. My issue is that after only a week I still feel plenty of product in the bottle but the spray broke - no more spray or noise. So that is a bummer. I also wish the bottle was bigger. I'm hoping they can send me a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: samanthann92

customer_reviews.title: This WORKS but too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Update: They have raised the price by $3! From 12.99 to 15.99. I’ll be trying one of the other similar products. I’m Not spending $15 for one tiny can of this especially wken I’m a repeat customer. This works!!!!! Two cans in and they are trained. I used command “no barking” and I did NOT let them see the can, they dont necessarily even know that I was making the noise. Now, if they even attempt to bark I make a loud “SHHHH” sound and say no barking and they stop!
customer_reviews.author: J & K Mac

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly! Keeps the crazy dog from biting my mom!
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly. We have a dog that isn’t good with people who aren’t us, including my mom. We spray this once when she visits and then she carries it around. Just the sight of it keeps the dog at bay. We’ve bought two and one is now empty; we keep it as a decoy. Jack doesn’t like “The Can” at all. We joke about putting a picture of The Can in a T-shirt. It may actually be effective!
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: Must have for little trouble makers.
customer_reviews.text: Best thing i ever bought, when my dogs are being naughty or doing something i dont like, i give them a spray and the instantly stop in their tracks. I hate when they beg for food at the table, and when they see the can on the table they dont even attempt to beg. Also now once im holding the can, they'll freeze and stop whay they're doing. I always keep it in sight so they know its there & they dont act out as much. (No more table begging!) Only con is that it doesnt come in a bigger can & its a bit expensive
customer_reviews.author: Shameeda Altin

customer_reviews.title: Almost 0 product, barely lasted a week
customer_reviews.text: For about $10, it really should last more than a total of 15 one-second sprays. That is it. I'm already out in under a week of usage, using only 1-2 times a day. I don't think I even got a full ounce. I noticed it felt really light and empty when I opened it, and sure enough, there was almost nothing inside. For how much you pay, there REALLY should be more in there. I guess I will just have to find a more cost-effective solution. The smell is not bad, and yes it gets my dogs to behave better, but the price vs product ratio is absurd.
customer_reviews.author: RebelScumHan

customer_reviews.title: Works BUT...
customer_reviews.text: This does indeed work as a bad behavior deterrent but a regular can of air works just as well! The product is small so it easily fits in my pocket, but there are just a few “bursts” in the can. I have found that regular canned air although not as conveniently sized is just as effective and not as expensive. Seems to me that it’s the sound rather than the smell that does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: Effective deterrent for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent at curbing my German Shepherd urge to bark at other dogs whilst out on her walk. Use just once and afterwards she only has to see the canister and it’s enough to stop her barking. Only one complaint and that is that the top of the canister is flimsy and allows the propellant gas to escape when you are taking the cap off. Result is that there is only 1oz in the can but you don’t use it all because there is no pressure in the can to allow you to use it all. Hence the 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: English Nanny

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I can't believe it works. I have an Australian Cattle Dog and he has serious anxiety issues around other people. It's not that he's afraid of them but that he wants sooooo very badly to be petted by strangers. He freaks out pretty much anytime a person walks by. Not anymore. I used this 3 times and he has 100% stopped. Just when he sees the orange can he knows I mean business and he is calm and collected. I've tried so many other things besides a shock collar and I'll never have to use anything else again. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Cdubbs

customer_reviews.title: Saved the day
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It’s has helped us to train our dog from attacking the fince when other people are walking their dogs. We have a rode iron fince by a lake and our dog was charging the fince. Now she sits right by me. Also it has helped us on walks as well. If I spray it when she is displaying a behavior I don’t like she immediately stops. It has also came in handy with other dog I counters on our walk. One spray and they stop charging at us or baking. It’s been nice. I would say to get it even if you don’t have a do but worry about loose dogs on your walks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Barking stopped in 3 days.
customer_reviews.text: Our two little dogs have always been happy to hear me back into the garage when I come home... and would bark like crazy. After tiling the house it got to be too shrill... 3 days of training.. NO BARKING when I come home. They are still happy to see me, just not barking. It makes a very loud SHHHHHHH noise with the included lavender scent. It really startles them into paying attention when you do it... but it works. Keep it out of sight or they won't come near... And you can verbally say shhhhh and it reminds them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: My rambunctious pup likes to growl and bark loudly at literally everything and every one. I tried this, using only a light squeeze, and it worked. She was startled, but stopped barking. She calmed down and came to me. After several months, I have only had to spray it 3x. She now listens to my command more quickly. If voice commands do not work, I usually only have to show her the canister and she calms down. Very effective. It did have a calming effect on her and she did nap briefly not long after.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product: We were having problems with our puppy ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product: We were having problems with our puppy eating rocks and dirt - with the STOP THAT - we were able to easily discourage the activity within a couple of days. We were also having problems with nipping and chewing on the furniture - that has stopped altogether. We have only used about 8 sprays of the approximate 50 in the can. Use as it says on the package for the best results.
customer_reviews.author: Deb H.

customer_reviews.title: It works for 7 dogs here 😊
customer_reviews.text: Currently I have my four dogs. A K9 and 3 little dogs. THEN stepdaughter asked if we’d “watch” her dog and she never came back for him & has gotten other dogs, so guessing he’s not leaving. Step son moved back in temporarily with his dog. Mom passed and we weren’t going to let her very elderly dog have no where to go, that being said it can get loud. My dogs are trained to quiet when I make a shh noise. I can’t shhhhh!! loud enough for this crew. This does the trick! Quiet ahhh the crew working on the house appreciate it too 😊
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J Ribeiro

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This product works so good on my two dogs. They are barkers! Whenever someone walks in the door, they need to tell everyone. The problem is they won't stop! Bought this, and absolutely love it. Now we just show them the can and they usually stop barking! Also worked for my sister's dogs! Bought her a can too! My dogs: 2 small mutts chihuahua sized dogs My sisters dogs: 1 shibainu mix, 1 cocker spaniel, and 1 pit mix They all react well to this can! Ü
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I have a Bichon/ Shih Tzu that barks incessantly so ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a Bichon/ Shih Tzu that barks incessantly so I tried this before using a shock collar. It works in the moment, it startles her but it has not helped with the behavior. I’ve been using it in similar circumstances each time, not every time she barks but still no progress. The blast of air from the can seems to be what startles her, the smell emitted lasts for a while and it’s not a pleasant smell but I could put up with it if the product worked for my dog as intended.
customer_reviews.author: sol

customer_reviews.title: and then scratch the ground like a bull before it charges
customer_reviews.text: This thing pisses my dog right off. It just makes her bark more aggressively. The pheromones? A joke. She did not develop any fear of this product's hissy wrath. I did not find that simply presenting her with the can was an effective warning. "Stop it or I will discharge the canister" has been entirely ineffective as a verbal warning. The sight of the can would cause her to rear up, bare her teeth, and then scratch the ground like a bull before it charges. This product is useless, except for the sheer entertainment value of watching a crazy-eyed dog go off-the-wall berserk with hateful rage once startled by this product.
customer_reviews.author: JLBM

customer_reviews.title: It works! Hallelujah!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Who knew something in such a small package could be so effective! I have two small yorkies (some refer to them as "yappers," much to my dismay) and I decided to order this out of a moment of frustration at an outdoor restaurant when said furbabies relentlessly barked at EVERYTHING. It was embarrassing and super weird, since we take them out pretty often. We came to the conclusion that it was probably due to the number of other dogs around and the unfamiliar venue. Anyway, this spray actually works! I'm so impressed! I'm not sure if it's the sound it makes or the actual product that sprays out, but it's definitely effective for our babies!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work. When he starts to bark or misbehave and he won’t respond to verbal commands, we spray it. Makes a loud hissing sounds and sprays a sent. He stops right away and comes over to me. Don’t always have it handy to completely stop him of some of his bad habits. My vet doesn’t like it. Says it causes fear and that’s why they stop the behavior. She feels we should use a different method. Luckily we don’t need to use often.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon J

customer_reviews.title: Stop barking problems
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great. We just got a rescue dog and after a few weeks he started barking like crazy. We wanted a way to correct this without hurting him. He would bark, we sprayed one short burst near him. His eyes would get big and then he would go lay down. The terrible barking stopped within about a week. A few months later and we still down have problems. Heads up. It is a very small can but it was enough to fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: About as effective as a water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Definitely works as advertised. Stopped my dog from rough-play-biting my hands dead in his tracks. But I don’t think it’s any more effective than a simple squirt with a water bottle. Louder and more confusing the first time, maybe. Both had the same initial effect on my dog. The can barely has any product in it; probably get 10 uses out of it. Wouldn’t buy again but not mad at it either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but expensive to keep up
customer_reviews.text: Good while it lasted. Got a bad one that only had a few sprays in it but the others I bought worked/work good. I got them to help with the constant barking but it only lasted a few days and it would get expensive to keep up. I do think it’s affectiveness in stopping bad behavior is amazing. We now just use it on walks to scare off dogs who want to chase or come after us lol. Stops them in their tracks and they run away.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Barringer

customer_reviews.title: It REALLY worked!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe this not only worked..it only took ONE time and my dog NO longer trys to jump in my lap.we had a constant back and forth over and over with him jumping on my lap or consistantly trying to.hes a hyper aussie.one quick spray of this after saying STOP IT! And he has not been in my lap since.!!the can sits next to my chair and all i do now is hold my palm up,and say Stop it. Or show him the can once or twice. Thats it! Now saying stop it in a certain tone also makes him stop other bad behavior. HIGHLY recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: EngS

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all. I had tried the canned ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work at all. I had tried the canned air for cleaning keyboards which worked well. Going back to that. For my dog, the smell is not a deterrent and the sound of the air is not loud as compared to the regular canned air.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Ive bought this product over the past few years. Basically I sprayed it once, and keep it around and my small 12 yr old takes one look at the can and then behaves. It works on my friends dog whos been staying with us and she is 9 years old, and tries to eat my lil guys' food, and this helped train her as well. Again, only have to pick it up and shes off to do something else!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: This works! My chihuahua barks and snaps at anyone who gets too close while he is in my lap and ignores “no bark” command. First time I used this, he was startled and immediately stopped barking and jumped down, then got back in my lap seeking approval. It took one more incident and now I just keep it close by when he is in my lap. If he starts to bark, I tell him “no bark” and reach for the can. He immediately stops. I have not had to use it anymore
customer_reviews.author: Regina Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: THIS WORKS GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS WORKS!! I live between two neighbors with barking dogs. One a black lab and the other German Shepard. They love to bark at each other. I use one small squirt of this handy dandy little can and they shut right up! I don't think the pheromone smell is what shuts them up but the sound. It makes a loud spray sound. This has been a life saver for me. I take it along on walks too. Seems to work with most breed of dogs. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: BlondiegirlDG

customer_reviews.title: THIS SPRAY IS AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS SPRAY IS AMAZING!!! My 3 small dogs are barkers! I tried a vibrate/noise collar for the two boys....who bark the most. They learned to bark right through the vibrating and the noise of the collar! The very first spray of the STOP THAT, worked!! I said in a firm voice.....No Bark, as soon as I sprayed it!! It has made a HUGH difference in the barking! Most of the time, all I have to do now, is say NO BARK, if any one of them starts & they stop immediately! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT TO ANY ONE LOOKING TO CHANGE A BAD BEHAVIOR.......NOT ONLY FOR BARKING! I only wish it came in a larger size!! LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.author: robin c

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A MIRACLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has stopped my dog from barking too much, and any time I bring it out she stops whatever she is doing. I love it!!! She knows just by looking at it that she needs to behave. Yesterday we were walking in the park and a pit bull mix dog came aggressively at us. I pulled out the spray and sprayed the dog in the face. He pulled back then lunged again. Each time I sprayed he stopped and pulled back. It gave the owners enough time to get their dog under control. Maybe saved my shihtzu's life. I am very very grateful!!!! Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia F.

customer_reviews.title: dog stops barking at the sight of the bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand how this product works so well. As other reviewers have said, I just had to use it once and my dog (a mini-dachshund) immediately caught on. The dog was barking at someone in the hallway, and I sprayed it. It smells faintly (it's not unpleasant) and the noise wasn't even that loud. My dog sniffed the air and stopped barking. Now all I have to do is grab the spray when he barks and he quiets down! Really amazing, would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Tucson

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS on our 7 month old pup biter!
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty skeptical about this method. My 7 month old golden pup is a biter when she plays. We’ve tried everything short of training. We have two little kids and she play bites pretty rough. It has to stop! I figured I would give this a try. The sound of the sprayer is startling to her and she stops her bad behavior immediately. Plus, the smell of this is so good!!!! It’s worth a try! We hope we don’t need another bottle but if we do, we will definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: I have recommended this to many dog owners who have adopted rescue ...
customer_reviews.text: This product really works! It is a very effective training tool for difficult dog situations...It has a very pleasant aroma that calms the dogs while the effective spray noise gets the dog's attention. Along with "Stop That" being verbalized, the dog quickly gets the message. I have recommended this to many dog owners who have adopted rescue dogs that many come with negative issues. All have been thankful for the recommendation. Sometimes it only takes one or two "shots" (not directly on the dog, but above it) for the dog to get the message. Stubborn or very traumatized dogs (dogs that have been bitten/mauled or abused) may take longer training.
customer_reviews.author: Janice A. Connett

customer_reviews.title: Works great for barking
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Works great for my Doodle, who likes to trick strangers into coming close to say “hi” to her and then scare the hell out of them by barking like they just assaulted her :) One spray and she stops!
customer_reviews.author: KMcQ

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I adopted a pitt with a black hole for a stomach. She was eating everything. I found myself hiding to eat like a wild squirrel... quietly opening the fridge only to feel a hard stare on the back of my neck...waiting for me to drop my guard so she could feast. Any attempts at eating alone were ruined by her wedging her head against me and making sad eyes...I was slowly withering away. Then I got this spray. One spray and she froze ... my taco dropped from her mouth. I noticed results day one. A week later and when I eat now , my ravenous beast has turned into a quietly watching pup. Seriously this stuff is great
customer_reviews.author: ashley sutton

customer_reviews.title: Omg!!! It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was very heatitant on this actually working.... first time I purchased it was at Walmart on clearance.... got it home.... and I have a boxer, a lab, and a Rottweiler ...They are quite embarrassing when company comes over, they don’t stop barking and carrying on. One spray at this and they all stopped! I couldn’t believe it! Had to go on and buy more, now they just see the can....And they shut right up and stop! But it doesn’t seem to work well and small dogs, I also have a Yorky and nothing stops is barking!
customer_reviews.author: JIll

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. We adopted a rescue dog who was a ...
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal. Amazing. We adopted a rescue dog who was a runner. We had tried a shock collar and a clicker with minimal success. STOPIT spray had a great affect on her and she was pretty much trained in two sessions. She still runs out the front door, but waits for us. She goes about 15-20 feet from us and comes back. She walks without a leash now and can hang outside with us. She is very loyal and eager to please now that she has boundaries.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Keene

customer_reviews.title: Does it's Job & Smells AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this! I think it's the sound that actually distracts my dog but I takes him out of whatever he is currently doing and makes him look at me. I can just see him saying "WTH was that about, Mom?!" May I just say that I absolutely LOVE the scent! Forget about calming him down, it calms ME down! And if I happen to get it in his mane when I spray it, I'm snuggling him the whole night! LOL. FYI: I've reordered 3x so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very effective product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the recommendation of a dog trainer. I was a little skeptical and even more hesitant to buy when I saw the price. However, I was quickly impressed with the effectiveness of the product. I have two large boxers that had developed a barking problem when anyone would come to the front door or pass our fence. I literally sprayed it once and the barking ceased immediately. Now, I simply show the can and both dogs go to a neutral area and lay down. It is really a miracle in a can!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa G.

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for the length of time it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Product lasted for 1 day so therefore it’s not worth the price. My puppy hated the smell and noise so therefore bad behavior stopped immediately which was great. Since he has so many behaviors that need correcting: chewing, leash pulling, jumping, play biting, etc. we would spray quite often. This can only lasted 24 hours so basically it would be $700 a month on this spray. 3 stars because it did work.
customer_reviews.author: kleavelle

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking at this...buy it. It works
customer_reviews.text: If you are searching for good behavior spray, you must be feeling a little desperate. We were too when someone recommended this spray to us. It is a total game changer. It's loud and smells terrible, but it stopped our dogs from barking immediately. After about 2 weeks of use we only need to hold up the can or make a loud "SHHH" sound like the can makes and they immediately stop their barking.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha A

customer_reviews.title: Works to settle my dogs excitement
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep my dogs from barking and jumping up when we or guests walk in the door. I’ve only had to actually use it a couple times and then when I would just pick it up, they would immediately settle down. It’s been a few months now and I have not had to get it out, but I know now that if I needed to, it works
customer_reviews.author: Sam I Am

customer_reviews.title: easy way to stop a particular behavior
customer_reviews.text: If you have a need for a quick, easy way to stop a particular behavior, especially if it requires calming the dog(s), this is an amazing product. I have been carrying it with me on every dog park visit for the last several years. It's stopped many fights and other undesirable behaviors. I don't need it for my dogs, except to protect them from others.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M

customer_reviews.title: Miracle product. It's like night and day
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a miracle. I dont have to even spray it anymore usually, I just show her the orange can and she corrects her behavior. Really I was at my wits end, my dog is very strong and I had a hard time walking her. But with this spray she doesnt even pull towards other cats or dogs anymore, I can give her more slack on her.leash and its given me my sense of control back. For anyone with dogs with problem behaviors, I seriously reccomend this product 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Kiffyy

customer_reviews.title: Works but not enough spray
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a leasher puller and likes to jump on people. I was using it for both of those behaviors. I didnt even get to the jumping on people because literally in are 30 min walk the spray was gone. I onky used short burst as recommended. But it was gone so fast. It did help her to stop tugging on the leash but since Im without I feel like it’ll just return. I’ll be buying two more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Tiaja

customer_reviews.title: Spray noise works to stop barking
customer_reviews.text: Worked well to stop my dogs from barking at other dogs on our walks but it rans out pretty fast. The noise more than then the scent seemed to distract my dogs from barking. Effective but pretty pricey for just a few sprays. (Maybe i recieved a defective bottle, ran out after just a few sprays).
customer_reviews.author: Anton Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Caused coughing in both me and my dog.
customer_reviews.text: I had previously used another brand of spray which is no longer available so I tried this. It has a very strong odor that remains in the room for a long time. It made me cough and sent my dog into a long spell of reverse sneezing which couldn’t be brought under control until the room was thoroughly aired out. Obviously others have used this with success but it was not suitable for us.
customer_reviews.author: Noreen Starr

customer_reviews.title: Works for us!
customer_reviews.text: I have a crazy Aussie Doodle that can get a little wild at times and forget his manners. I have only used this on him about 4 times and now I just have to get the can out and show him and he immediately stops whatever bad behavior he is doing. I think it's more the noise the can makes than the actual scent, I think the noise kind of scares him. But it works so whatever!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: IT’S A MIRACLE IN A CAN
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but I figured I’d try anything to calm my miniature Aussie’s barking and chasing the house cats. Well OMG it works! I just give a short burst behind him, not making eye contact or letting him see that I have a can, and he instantly stops and takes a nap under the sofa! YAY! My dog trainer suggested not letting him know it was I who was making the noise, and it really works. It’s like a miracle to calm down my little herder Aussie. I’ll be buying more for sure.
customer_reviews.author: C.J. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: not a sure thing!
customer_reviews.text: did not have any effect, the noise or spray during a dog fight. I had bought this and another product in the event I had one. well one happened, and this product and the other failed. in good conscious, there is NO product out there, that will break up a dog fight, that could be safely used on two angry dogs, hell bent on fighting. it is not the product's fault. but does NOT work. TY.
customer_reviews.author: pleased customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well for barking terriers
customer_reviews.text: I've tried everything I could find or learn about to stop my terrier from constant barking. She's very smart and only had to hear/smell this twice to get the message. If she starts to bark, I just tap the can on the table and she stops. I am also rewarding the "no bark" with positive reinforcement. The woman who recommended this to me said her dog became immune after 4 weeks, but admitted they fell out of routine. My only concern is the Mfg does not say what the pheromone is "saying" to the dogs. I don't want long term personality changes in the dog. However, she seems to be ok so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Ries

customer_reviews.title: Thought it would work,
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would work, but no I was wrong. My dog is an American bulldog & she barks for anything. My boyfriend can’t hug me, I can’t wash dish, the door can’t be open, cause she will bark. Her bark is super annoying especially through this pregnancy. I decided to give this a try, to see if it helped her behavior & sadly it didn’t. The noise kinda puts her in a mood of like “what’s going on, what’s that” but after that she continues to bark. No effect on her. Very disappointed because I read so many good reviews on this product, but maybe is not for all dogs..
customer_reviews.author: Xochilt Tinoco

customer_reviews.title: Works miracles on our stubborn dog!
customer_reviews.text: Our jack russell can very stubborn and dominating. This corrected her bad habits so fast! She kept scratching at the door and howling, so we sprayed it under the door and she immediately stopped! She tried scratching again a few hours later, so we used the spray again and she hasn't done it since. I wish I had found this product years ago!
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: before when I commanded him "drop it" he would look at me like I was crazy and when I got close he ...
customer_reviews.text: Totally works!!! My puppy loves to play chase with some of our valuable things. Especially my kids socks, shoes, toys etc... before when I commanded him "drop it" he would look at me like I was crazy and when I got close he would take off. I purchased this and used it after I used the word "drop it" and now he automatically drops the item when I say "drop it". If there is a behavior we don't like we just show him the bright orange can he stops and knows that it is not a behavior we like. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Z

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product instant results
customer_reviews.text: Works WONDERS! Used this on my rescue to stop his aggression and barking, he had some difficulty getting along with other dogs and this fixed it. I carry it with me when we’re on walks and one spray stops his barking immediately. Also works really well with crate training- one quick spray gets him quiet at night, and now he loves his crate
customer_reviews.author: Crista

customer_reviews.title: Worse case scenario
customer_reviews.text: I am SO thankful that we found this product!! We have an 11 week old german shepherd/shark. She likes to play bite. Unfortunately, it hurts. "no" doesn't work well, because she doesn't understand. The spray bottle and green apple no-bite yuck hasn't helped. We used another sentry product similar to this for our cats, so I decided to order some. Worse case scenario, it doesn't work and I'm out $7. I've had it for about 20 minutes.. and she responds every time. Immediately sits/lays down and becomes calm. It doesn't leave an odor, doesn't hurt her... I'm ordering more. I think this is essential in puppy training.
customer_reviews.author: jena

customer_reviews.title: Works for my pupperoo!
customer_reviews.text: I have a now 4 month old Bluetick Coonhound and I started using this product with him at 3 months old. I LOVE IT. I think with all products, you just have to try them. Some will work and others won't. I wanted to at least do a positive review. The pheromone is actually kinda a nice smell haha. It hisses when it comes out. But now all I have to do is get out the bottle, and he cuts it out lol! This is a staple in our new dog home, and am curious about other products from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: LaLa

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product/idea. It does work, but it isn't worth the price. It is just scented canned air. I feel like you would get the same effect by using regular canned air you would purchase from an office supply store and it would last longer. This product doesn't last long at all, especially if you have a dog that you need to do a good deal of training with.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Probably best for mini breed dogs
customer_reviews.text: It seamed to work the first couple of times but the top popped off and wouldn't go back on. I contacted the company for a replacement which they happily provided. It doesn't last long and the can gets real cold so be aware of that. Probably better for mini breeds as my bullies were not affected after the first couple of sprays.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy D.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This works fabulously! We have a very sweet, sometimes overly affectionate dog who loves to jump on friends who come to visit. Got to be a problem with younger kids who would sometimes get knocked over and over relatives who did not enjoy the attention. The first time we used this, while telling her "no" when she was jumping, she stopped. Have used it a few times since then and it works the same every time. I don't know if it's the noise, the smell, or the combination, but she listens when we use it.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: A Miracle remedy!
customer_reviews.text: This a great product... I understand my little dogs bark is a defense mechanism (of sorts) for her, but when it became incessant and I couldn't get her to stop it was beyond annoying for me...and my neighbors. "Stop That""has proven to be a miracle remedy.. Only had to use it twice... the noise is startling so it really got her attention immediately...the pheramone aroma is really nice and I believe has residual calming effect....except now I don't get the opportunity to smell it as all I have to do now is SHOW her the little orange can and she stops barking.
customer_reviews.author: Madelyn Medeiros

customer_reviews.title: I got home and decided to check Amazon and glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I first saw this used at a local pet store on overly Excited dogs. When I saw it used I knew I had to buy it. When I found it at the store it was so over priced I opted out. I got home and decided to check Amazon and glad I did, very good price! I'm It sure if it's the spray sound or the safe "chemical" that chills out my hyperactive American Bulldog but I don't really care because this stuff works! So well that I don't even have to spray not anymore I just show my dog the can and he relaxes. It's so small and portable easy to take on walks or store in your purse.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great Product !!!
customer_reviews.text: This product works!! I have 4 dogs that used to bark at everyone that came to the front door and I had to pull them all back so I could get to the door. One spray from this product and they all backed off and went the other way. I also had a little dog that used to bark at every animal on TV which set the other dogs off..One spray is all it took. Now all I have to do is show them the can and they settle down. My house hasn't this peaceful for years and I can relax when the doorbell rings. I am amazed at how well this product works...
customer_reviews.author: Mary Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Loud and not effective
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping for the best but was really disappointed. Used it several times and never ever saw any affect. Each time we used it we knew someone was walking up to our door. We would move the dogs into another room & as the person knocked on the door we used the spray and made the dogs stay. Well, they stayed but refused to stop barking. Went through 2 cans and still the exact same reaction. The dogs are terrified of the spray because of loud burst. Each time they recoiled in fear as they barked non-stop. We saw zero change in their attitude to the spray. We just became sick of smelling the sweet smell.
customer_reviews.author: SandersWI

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have found this spray sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I love this spray!! I rescued a beautiful puppy from the shelter who seemed very friendly until we got her home, now we know she barks all the time!!! we spray this and she is quiet instantly, sometimes I don't even have to spray it, she just sees the orange can and stops barking will keep buying forever, but hopefully she learns to stop barking at everyone
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Wow! It totally works!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Works like a charm. After a couple sprays, you don’t even have to use it. You just waive the little can in front of your little angel, and they stop what they are doing and pay attention!!! If you don’t have the can, you can make a shhhh sound with your mouth and it works, too! No more barking at the mailman or begging for food. No more pulling on the leash. Going to buy some More in case she needs a refresher spritz. PS. Smells good, too!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Moore

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from PetSmart for twice the price originally. It is a great training aid to stop dogs from eating things off the ground while walking, to stop them from jumping on people or counters, or from tearing up things. You have to use it IMMEDIATELY during their unwanted action. Make sure when they are doing what you want them to do, "Leave It" "Stay" "No jumping", then you praise them for the good behavior. We love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Zar

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for bulldog
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work. I am listening to my dog bark as I type this. Just squirted the bottle. Still barking. This may work on different dogs. Mine is stubborn. He stops for a second, smells the air and continues barking.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Hardly any sprays in the can!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for keeping the dog from “waking you” ratchet than you walking it. Too bad it is a rip off. The first can that a friend sent me had about 6 to 8 sprays. I bought another can because the first one worked so well for dog walking and there may be 3 to 4 sprays in it! Not worth the money at all, and of course you can’t return it!
customer_reviews.author: SP's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Try it! It works!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! My dog has stopped jumping as much and if she does, we bring it out and she stops. I got it when she wouldn’t stop barking in the house...she had discovered her voice. She has stopped that now. Whe. We use it, she stops the offense and the smell calms her. I heard it doesn’t work for all dogs but give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: New mom

customer_reviews.title: No compensation received
customer_reviews.text: Search for a video called "Naptime!" - with no kiddos in the room After you're done laughing, buy this product. A miracle for those who want a well behaved pooch. You won't find a better deal anywhere - currently about 40% of pet store pricing. Only side effect is a strange aversion to you when you're spraying any aerosol product. Cooking oil, brake clean, and keyboard dusters come to mind.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Behavior correction spray
customer_reviews.text: It got my dog’s attentions but they didn’t seem to dislike the smell enough to stop barking. I would recommend if you don’t have two stubborn dachshunds. It works as advertised just not strong enough for my little yappers.
customer_reviews.author: D. Autrey

customer_reviews.title: Humane and Gets Results
customer_reviews.text: Nothing would keep my dog from chewing our living room furniture and I didn't want to keep him in another room all the time. I bought this spray as a suggestion from Amazon and it works far better than I could ever imagine. We only needed to spray him a handful of times and now he behaves at just the mention of the word "spray". One can lasts quite awhile because after the initial few sprays, you will rarely need to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Gantos

customer_reviews.title: This is a good option for nervous dogs
customer_reviews.text: This is a good option for nervous dogs; I got ultrasound device and my dog got sick and couldn't eat for two days then I have used this other product and works much better, of course, needs to be consistent otherwise dogs are like little kids they will back to the bad habits :). I like it and will recommend it; (For clarification, I bought this one and one that is called "corrector" the can is red. Two of them are working great for our dogs. Same review for both.
customer_reviews.author: Any

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This product is amazingly powerful! We have only had to spray it a few times before our dog had gotten the point. After a few sprays, he would see the container and cower back to what he was previously doing. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: loyal67

customer_reviews.title: This worked great while training my puppy not to bark at other ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked great while training my puppy not to bark at other dogs on the other side of the street. It did exactly what it was supposed to do, stop them in their tracks and get their attention on something else. The reason I gave it 4 stars, is because the smell made me sick to my stomach. I didn't care for the smell, so if it had been odorless, would have definitely given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: tmy14

customer_reviews.title: It's a miracle!
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 month old puppy was a holy terror at night with aggressive behavior and biting. I tried everything I had read and what the trainer said to do, nothing worked. One spray of this in her direction shut all that bad behavior down in an instant! It's like night and day! Thank you, thank you, thank you! I can enjoy my pup for the first time in months!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Ehh...
customer_reviews.text: May or may not work, depends on your dog and their attitude. Worked on my lil Yorkie, but my Shih Tzu totally ignored it. The essential oil “scent” does not seem to be calming at all, the hiss is what my Yorkie responded to. Small can, doesn’t last long, but isn’t really expensive so you aren’t out much if it doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly VanOver

customer_reviews.title: ... but only because it makes noise my dogs don't like. I'm not sure what the "hormones" are supposed ...
customer_reviews.text: Helps but only because it makes noise my dogs don't like. I'm not sure what the "hormones" are supposed to do. I was hoping it would calm them and have a more lasting effect after the initial burst of air. But it has no lasting effect. Might as well buy an electronics air duster, or air horn, for the same effect at less cost.
customer_reviews.author: Crista S. Forest

customer_reviews.title: It works for one of my pups great!
customer_reviews.text: So my chihuahua barks at any little noise or "no noise" outside and this spray is so freaking awesome! Even when he is at his most crazy (new person walking through the door for example), he stops barking immediately when I spray it in the air. For my other dogs it does nothing (my Catahoula just tries to eat the spray, but then again, she licked the "stop chewing" bitter apple spray off the trim and chair legs, so that means little I am sure). Long story short I would definitely give the spray a go. I am buying my 4th bottle today.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm to get your dog to pay attention
customer_reviews.text: I learned of using this from my dog trainer. I have recommended it to friends. I'm on my second can. Now that my puppy is a teenager, she started chasing our cat. I just have to show her the can to keep her from harassing our kitty.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing Spray
customer_reviews.text: This product has been life changing!!!! I have 2 dogs who barked at every little sound and sometimes they’d bark at the air (for no reason at all). Their barking was all day everyday, out of control. I just started using this spray this past weekend, a total of 4 times and so far one dog hasn’t barked and the Pomeranian has only barked 3 times. My stress level has decreased succinctly. I recommend this product to anyone who has a barking dog that’s out of control.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I had been trying other techniques with my 8mth miniature schnauzer to stop jumping and barking at the back door when he sees squirrels or birds. It wasn't working. Just 2xs using this spray and he now obeys the STOP command at the back door and in other barking/jumping situations.
customer_reviews.author: Fun in the sun

customer_reviews.title: Great deterrent
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The spray deters aggression and helps in the training process. I have recommended this to a friend and she loves it. My dog corrects his behavior when he sees the can. When he is growling at the other dogs, the ferimones calm him down.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: While the product did what it claimed it would it only lasted about 6 uses. I thought the can felt extremely light when it arrived and it may be possible I got a bad one but it seems a bit ridiculous. I'll check out a can in the pet supply store and will contact Amazon if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Anne H

customer_reviews.title: Worked for short few sprays that were in here. HINT: Pay attention to the Ounces.
customer_reviews.text: Consider this a "tester" size can. If you are training or conditioning dogs not to bark, this will be gone very quickly. There are competitors out there for half the cost. Pay attention to the ounces when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Chele

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Is Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. When our dogs fight, it gets their attention immediately and they stop. The sound isn't loud like a horn (it's more of a loud hiss) but it does the job. When we spray it, our dogs immediately look at us and then go do something else. The can smells nice but when I spray it, I don't really smell anything (although it's clear the dogs do). I highly recommend it. We've been using it for about a week -- my only fear is they will get used to it. But for now, it's fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley R Mika

customer_reviews.title: Great Harmless Dog Behavior Spray
customer_reviews.text: Great harmless dog behavior spray. Uses loud condensed air spray with a calming lavender scent. Will make your dog stop doing whatever is wrong and you want to correct. We had a problem with our dog jumping up on people and after a couple times being sprayed in the face and the "down" command, now all we have to do is show her the orange canister and she knows.
customer_reviews.author: kykim41042

customer_reviews.title: I'm a big fan of Sentry!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a few sentry products lately and have found them all to be great! I used the cat calming collars on my newly rescued cat who was stressed and pulling out all her fur. She instantly stopped. So when I got a puppy and needed a humane way to stop bad puppy behavior (especially biting feet or jumping up on my 3 year old son). This worked GREAT! The noise startled her to make her stop what she was doing. I tried a product that just made a sound and didn't have pheromones in it and it didn't work as well. It basically just made my dog mad and bark at me and growl.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Gittings

customer_reviews.title: Scent is way too strong and makes my dogs sneeze
customer_reviews.text: I usually use the Pet Corrector (also available on Amazon) and tried this instead. The hissing noise is just as effective as the Pet Corrector but the perfume is gross. It makes my dogs sneeze, I don't think that was the intended effect and I don't feel good about exposing them to extra chemicals. It has a cloying, flowery perfume-y smell that we don't enjoy at all. If they could encapsulate the pheromones in an unscented base, then maybe they'd have a winner.
customer_reviews.author: OrangeLemonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Paid almost $20 for this at Petsmart, so this price is MUCH better. This works great to stop my dogs (and other dogs) when they are losing their minds. Always stops the dogs immediately so that you can direct them to better behavior. I always carry this with me when walking the dogs. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Evan Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: This absolutely, without a doubt, works as a natural deterrent, as long as you use it consistently and immediately after/during the offence (think Cesar Milan's "shhht" noise). My dog responds immediately and remembers the "lesson" after only 1 or 2 repeats. We've used it to train her to keep out of certain areas of the house, and to keep from jumping up & nipping. Two small downsides: the smell is bothersome - it's very strong - although, perhaps this is part of what keeps the dog listening/remembering. It's quite expensive for the size - it does not last long at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time this evening when I went to feed my daughter's three large dogs while the kids are out of town. They like to jump on me, so I just gave it one quick blast and they backed off fast! Great little product for training dogs!
customer_reviews.author: SherGib1946

product_meta.title: SENTRY Pet Care Sentry Good Behavior Stop That! Noise & Pheromone Spray for Dogs
product_meta.description: Size:1 ozSENTRY Stop That! For Dogs
feature_bullets: Uses noise and pheromone technology to stop bad behaviors in dogs
Clinically proven to provide quick, effective results without causing harm to dogs

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
